body:
Comment 1: 
I know shell escapes are appealing, but we have worked very hard to limit
what goinstall can do, so that we have the flexibility to reimplement
it from time to time.  Being able to run arbitrary shell commands
throws that out the window.  It's not an option.

Goinstall also works to keep the makefiles it generates from being
able to run arbitrary shell code.  If they can do that, please create an issue.
